snippet: Watch a slide show of photographs from the past week in New York City and the region. Subjects include the filming of a new sitcom, “Brooklyn Taxi”; a march over the Brooklyn Bridge; and a real estate developer at the top of his newest tower.
abstract: Watch a slide show of photographs from the past week in New York City and the region. Subjects include the filming of a new sitcom, “Brooklyn Taxi”; a march over the Brooklyn Bridge; and a real estate developer at the top of his newest tower.

headline.main: The Week in Pictures for Oct. 11
